title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.7 - Defacement of parkway property
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.7 - Defacement of parkway property

State Regulations

The injury, defacement, removal or destruction of surfaces
within the parkway system, or of its structures, appurtenances, facilities or
property, is prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
